nodes.text: The SE-2 worker droid, also known as the farm droid, was a loose-jointed model of utilitarian menial labor droid featuring a monocular photoreceptor with dual-imaging plane. An SE-2 named "Essie" worked on the farm of Galen Erso, and alerted the Erso family when he spotted Director Orson Krennic's Imperial shuttle approaching the homestead in 13 BBY.
